original: @327a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @327a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva, the great being, who possesses great compassion.

original: tadya th'a / aa ba lo ki ni /🔽ba lo ka ni /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aa ba lo ki ni / ba lo ka ni /

original: dz'i ba ha pa ri sho dha ni /
analyzed: dz'i ba ha pa ri sho dha ni /

original: dhi da ni @327b ya ga me /
analyzed: dhi da ni @327b ya ga me /

original: aa sh'a pa ri sho dha ni /
analyzed: aa sh'a pa ri sho dha ni /

original: sarba satva ma no ra the /
analyzed: sarba satva ma no ra the /

original: k'a ya siddhe shru ti dh'a ra n'i smri ti dha na sv'ah'a /
analyzed: k'a ya siddhe shru ti dh'a ra n'i smri ti dha na sv'ah'a /

original: cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing aa ba marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te nang re zhing zos na /
analyzed: cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing aa ba marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te nang re zhing zos na /
translated: For seven days, one should recite the mantra over an avamargha tooth stick seven times and chew on it each day.

original: nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so //
analyzed: nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so //
translated: One will learn a hundred ślokas per day.

original: zla ba drug gi bar du byas na /
analyzed: zla ba drug gi bar du byas na /
translated: If one does this for six months,
one will become a dhāraṇī holder.

original: shloo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: shloo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The learning of a hundred ślokas is complete.
